text: he imanavala'o! Vadhare padata anumanathi baco, jani lo ke ketalaka anumano gunaha che ane jasusi na karo ane na to tamara manthi ko'i ko'ini ninda kare, sum tamara manthi ko'i pana potana mrta bha'inum masa khavanum pasanda karase? Tame tene napasanda karaso ane allahathi darata raho,ni:Sanka allaha tauba kabulakaranara, dayalu che
